CustomField.formula: AND( OR( CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'CCTP'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Bridged USDC Standard'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Alt Mempool') ), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Circle Mint')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Core API')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Programmable Wallets')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Read Only API')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Accounts API')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Crypto Deposits')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Crypto Payouts')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Cybavo VAULT')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Cybavo Cashflow Manager')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'PSP Crypto Settlement')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Smart Contract Platform')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Gas Station')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Verite')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Activation Incentives')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Channel Sales')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Institutional Trading Partnership')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Loans')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Performance Incentives')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Referrals')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Blockchain Partnerships')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Indirect Liquidity Partners')), NOT(CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c,'Product Integrations')) )
CustomField.label: Auto Waive Custom Pricing
